website_summaries.verdict: Say goodbye to hand cranks with this precise and intuitive jack.
pros: ATD makes this tool very easy to use with foot pedal lift and release controls
The saddle measures 12.2 inches by 11.81 inches, giving you plenty of space to maneuver your motorcycle or ATV
Wears 4 casters (2 fixed, 2 swivel) for mobility
cons: Packaging leaves something to be desired, and can result in chipped paint

customer_reviews.title: Allows us to work on our bikes without taking up a lot of space!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with one screw for bolting the hydraulic jack to the base of the frame bent. Will be advising the manufacturer a couple of options to remove this risk. Love the low collapsed height, allows you to stow under your workbench or as I do, under your parked motorcycle. Raise the bike to a height that you can work with while sitting on a stool with rollers. Comes with to moveable wheels which allows you to push the work in progress bike into a corner and stay out of everyone way!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anis Bamadhaj

customer_reviews.title: Great Lift
customer_reviews.text: This thing has not let me down yet...I was a little skeptical buying this as i was afraid it would not be wide enough for my 2014 Harley Davidson StreetGlide. The width is perfect and it seemed to lift the bike with ease. I am very happy with the lift. The only criticism i can give is that the handle to pull the dolly is ridiculous. It attaches to the lift with one screw and the castors on the lift do not seem to roll freely making it very difficult to move the bike around once lifted...Other than that...Im happy.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Joshua Katz

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a gift. He seems happy with it and I have not heard any complaints. He builds/modifies his bikes so I cannot prvide much detail around the type of bike he has on it but they do sit very low.
customer_reviews.author: Unsettled

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy. While it does lift the bike
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. While it does lift the bike, it will loose pressure. It has lock teeth to keep it from going all the way back down however mine are bent so only one is holding the weight. Otherwise if you are using for working on a bike vs long term storage it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Jack
customer_reviews.text: I had read some negative reviews on this product but decided to purchase one anyhow. I am glad I did. I worked so well that I ended up purchasing an additional one to lift my other Harley. They both work great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great jack.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to detail my 2016 Street Glide. It holds the bike up with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rene' LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty good value. No problem with my heavy cruiser at all. Only negative was the packaging was pretty flimsy and the unit was a little scraped up and some of the HW was missing and loose. I had washers and nuts that fit so the trip to the HW store that would have knocked this to 3 stars was avoided...
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Lodi Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product, it works well to lift my 2008 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it works well to lift my 2008 Harley Softail Deluxe to change the oil and adjust my shocks. I Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tinner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: use it all the time with no fear of the motorcycle falling off the jack
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The jack worked great on my Honda VTX1300. You had to position it toward the front so it would fit under the fame; howver, it fit very well. The bike was stable, and very easy to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Steve

customer_reviews.title: Still not a bad buy, it functions at expected
customer_reviews.text: The rubber pads came off right away. Just glue them back. Still not a bad buy, it functions at expected.
customer_reviews.author: Clint M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk I jacked my motorcycle up one time with it and after letting it down it would not jack up again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Scott

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a Can Am Spyder. Which weight comes in about 1000 lbs and this jack works fine for my needs. I can jack bike up into the air and put jack stands under it with little worries.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Caudill

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this jack
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this jack. The jack fits under my 2013 Fatboy Lo and the platform adequately spans the frame. The box and packaging need some work but the jack is great.
customer_reviews.author: W.Williams

customer_reviews.title: if the bolt wasn't bent it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Other than the bolt for locking the control arm being bent about 40 degrees, this looks and operates very well
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Works well with dual sport, low metric cruiser is harder to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good lift, not as stable as I would like but lifts with ease
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for me!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for working on my Shovelhead and Panhead. Works great, the hydraulic system makes lifting the bike a breeze, and the lock positions allow you to safely lock it in to work on it.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Rider

customer_reviews.title: I pick things up and put them down.
customer_reviews.text: Great lift and sturdy, I use it to inspect / clean both of my motorcycles.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Lift well made
customer_reviews.text: The lift has a low initial profile for my H-D and is a well made heavy duty lift. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ransom Francis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked good and was in better working shape then in description. Some of the parts were brand new no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Maestas

product_meta.title: ATD Tools 7461 Motorcycle/ATV Jack - 1500 lbs. Capacity
product_meta.description: Ideal for motorcycles, ATVs, Lawn and Garden Tractor, Personal Watercraft, Snowmobiles, etc. Easy foot pedal lifting and release for precision control. Lifting range of 4-1/2" to 15" with locking positions at 9/5/8", 12-3/8" and 14-3/8". Rubber pad saddles and ratcheting tie down straps for protections and stability. 2-swivel and 2-Fixed casters for maneuverability. Meets A.S.M.E standards.
feature_bullets: Easy foot pedal lifting for release and precision control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars32 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
